website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a security cam that can work with Alexa, this is a custom-made choice.
pros: You can download video onto your computer instead of the cloud if you prefer
cons: Allows you to watch live streaming
For the cloud storage on this camera you will need to pay an ongoing fee

customer_reviews.title: Caught the guy!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best money ever spent. Just caught someone breaking in to my apartment to steal pain medication from my son a week after brain surgery. The guy the apartment sent to change the locks was the guy in the video!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Good but one big issue...
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice camera. Good quality and compact size. Capturing the sound is good, although not the best quality vs other cameras. The biggest issue and I think most important, is the camera will NOT send you a motion alert until AFTER the event has concluded. So if someone is in your home and the motion is constant, the camera will continue to capture the event, but NOT report it to you until motion has stopped. So that may when the person is leaving your place...
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price of admission to put a bad guy in jail
customer_reviews.text: Not three weeks after installing the Amazon Cloud Cam I received an alert of motion at our hunting cabin. There should not have been anyone there and I was surprised to find video of someone breaking-in and collecting our tools and hunting gear to take with him. I was not able to catch him in real time, but I was able to alert the Sherriff Dpt. within minutes of him leaving. With the 25 separate videos of the suspect the cloud Cam provided, the Sherriff Dpt. were able to quickly find him, our property, and put him in jail. Well worth the price of admission to put a bad guy in jail.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A Luttenbacher

customer_reviews.title: Cloud Cam bust burglar
customer_reviews.text: I got the Amazon Cloud cam to see what my cats do during the day. Today, I had left the house and was out running errands. I got an alert that motion was detected in my Kitchen. I looked at the live view and saw a person had broken into my home. I used the microphone feature and yelled at him to get out of my house and told him the police were on the way. He immediately left. Thank you Amazon - without my cloud cams, this could have had a very different ending.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Let's see what tech support can do.
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a camera that is good quality, not crazy expensive, app works well, and I get the correct notifications with motion sensor. This camera was perfect. No complaints. Going to get a few more. I also like I can get live video feeds through my fire TV. ***update*** After about a day and a half, the recordings from the motion detection stopped working. Tech support is a joke. After troubleshooting the motion alerts are now flakey. This camera in its currrent state is useless. I'm going to give support a shot to fix it, but I might be returning this and getting a nest cam.
customer_reviews.author: RON SAKA

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be rebooted every day or two making it useless!
customer_reviews.text: Constantly need rebooting, which has to be done manually. Very frustrating and makes the device close to useless because it does not work for more than a day when I am away. Keeps dropping from WiFi, while no other of my WiFi devices have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Message from the Situation Room

customer_reviews.title: Decent picture quality but several complaints
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to give access to others without giving them your Prime login and password. You shouldn't have to do this to give family, babysitters, etc. viewing access. Like others have mentioned there also doesn't appear to be a way to turn off the green LED. This definitely distracts my kids when trying to put them to bed. Lastly, it only records clips from what I can tell so most of the time it doesn't pick up for several seconds after motion is detected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the real cloud storage
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the camera I cannot believe it is 1080p. And it says it is cloud storage cam. but I can't watch the clips when the camera is damaged or stolen. I choose this cloud cam because I think I can watch the videos from the cloud storage after someone breaks in. However, I can't. I only can watch the clips when the camera is online. That means if someone breaks in and takes or damages the cam, I can see nothing and can't get the evidence for the police. What kind of cloud storage need the device stay online to make the cloud works.
customer_reviews.author: Baorun Huang

customer_reviews.title: Subscription plan stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about the NEED for a subscription in order to have more than 3 cameras, I don't really need the subscription just wanted to add a 4th camera. Didn't realize this issue till I tried to add the 4th camera...ahhhh nooo! need a $9.99 a month charge to add 1 additional camera the $6.99 plan is only as good as the free plan in this regard;pretty stupid plan.You think Amazon would throw in 1 more camera at $6.99 price. So I'm on the 30 day free trial can't use the 4th camera without a plan so looks like they may all go back.
customer_reviews.author: LarryB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Seems secure.
customer_reviews.text: These are great little units. Pros: They work right out of the box, and seem secure, no obvious open ports and that sort of thing. The only real con is that you don't have very much access to the guts of it to customize things like security settings and such. It would be nice to have 'advanced' options for advanced users. On the other hand most users would shoot themselves in the foot with such options.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Entropy

customer_reviews.title: Worst of the three I have (Nest and Arlo are the other two).
customer_reviews.text: I started with Nest, then added some Arlo cameras so I could take advantage of their batteries where I had no plugs. Then I added three Amazon CloudCams to save money and bandwidth. The Amazon CloudCams are a complete disappointment. Where I replaced a NestCam with an Amazon CouldCam, the night vision view is now a cloudy mess compared to the NestCam before it. Maybe that's why it's called CloudCam. I can't make out anything. In the app, the "live view" never works, despite the fact that I'm running gigabit internet thru Orbi wifi mesh and having no issues with the NestCams and Orbi cams. These CloudCams are the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Got Hacked (heard voice) - What are the security features?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an amazon camera to use as a baby monitor since I trusted Amazon to have top of the line security features. My wife and I are completely freaked out as we heard voices coming through the camera in the middle of the night and immediately pulled the plug on the camera. Our privacy in our home and bedroom was compromised and I can't find a phone number or anyone to talk to at amazon to escalate this issue. We will be taking corrective actions but for now, beware. We live in a scary world but now I have to go back to drawing board on finding a good baby camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dbousk

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera but they aren't selling them anymore
customer_reviews.text: Bought these cameras and they are great but I went to go buy more and amazon discontinued them so I can't buy anymore to add to the rest of my house that I just purchased. I really wish I could return them to get my money back so I can buy a camera system that I can add to and is more reliable.... so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tan-mcc

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes. Big bummer though
customer_reviews.text: 3 flaws 1) can’t turn off microphone it will listen 24/7. 2) can’t turn off status light and nightvision so there is a glare when facing out window 3) I hear you can’t record 24/7 to cloud. Only clips. Not good. Returned mine. I had high hopes. Pretty sure they will fix and hope they will with all the poor review. Customer service was no help when I called. Sticking with Nest for now. It was easy to set up so I gave 2 stars instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: M. Natter

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your $ on this.
customer_reviews.text: A total waste of money. Cameras are unreliable, and highly sensitive to WiFi disturbance. I never know if I'm seeing a live image, or a stale image 4 days old. I have to unplug to reset them every 3 days. Granted, I have Comcast broadband, which is as unreliable as my ex-wife. But that is no excuse for Amazon to sell junk to their customers. And, there are no adjustment camera controls either hard or software enabled. Camera needs to placed on perfect level surface to see straight. Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Finch

customer_reviews.title: It was great.... for 2 weeks, stopped working after that.
customer_reviews.text: It was great.... for 2 weeks. Both of my cameras suddenly stopped working after 2 weeks and there is no possible way to re-configure them. I tried their support number but was on hold for 42 min and never got to a support agent. I guess that's what you get when you buy the first version of a product. NEEDS MAJOR IMPROVEMENT!!
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is fine. I have nothing to compare it to though so I can only go by what I see. I agree with some of the other reviewers that I don't know why people are complaining about this camera. It works fine. I bought five of them. I currently have two of them up and will put the other three up and we'll buy one of the plans. As for the plans I see nothing wrong with the price it's actually very cheap if you look at it over a year. The only thing I wish is that you could use it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a scam!
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed these cameras for a year, and they work exceptionally well for indoor monitoring and communication. BUT...they are no longer sold, because Amazon has recently acquired Ring. We own both Ring and Cloud Cam cameras, but Amazon will not integrate the cloud storage accounts. So, our choices are to keep paying separate subscription fees for each brand of product; or dispose of the Cloud Cam equipment and replace them all Ring products. Either way, Amazon makes out like a bandit while the existing Cloud Cam customers get bilked.
customer_reviews.author: econn2000

customer_reviews.title: Not great for baby monitor...yet
customer_reviews.text: Beats out Nest Cam for sure, but has a major drawback. If you want to use as a baby monitor look elsewhere. The app goes quiet after around 10 mins of viewing. Worthless as a monitor. If they could upgrade the app to run at least sound continuous, this would be a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Will Creswell Lindow

customer_reviews.title: Needs significant software updates
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Great design Good picture quality Comes with installation kit Con: - Can’t switch off notifications when home (can only switch off whole camera, but I like it to continue recording). This will drain your phone fast when it lights up constantly. - can add 2 phones as an indicator that you are home - when you set it to switch off Camera when you are home, it does not switch it back on when you leave (likely a bug) - the app logges out automatically all the time (a pain when you use a very complicated password like me) Overall: nothing that can’t be fixed with a software update, but currently not mature yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eisbaer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, at First...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Cloud Cam to use as a way to monitor our animals and it was great at first, but then the audio stopped working through the camera. Amazon sent a refurbished one and at first that was Ok, but then it also has started to have "spotty" audio. I would not recommend this item, it isn't reliable.
customer_reviews.author: SJK

customer_reviews.title: Constantly loses connection with modem
customer_reviews.text: Seems every time the ATT high speed internet signal wavers, the cam loses contact with the modem. So you have to physically reset the cam to fix. What good is this if you are away from the house for a long period of time. Pretty useless. for security purposes. Don't know if this is a widespread problem or just one affecting an ATT modem and the cam. Will try to get it returned.
customer_reviews.author: GregA

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price - DO NOT BUY - Plan is a rip off
customer_reviews.text: Another update: 7 day storage for 7$ a month is a complete RIP OFFF you guys should be ashamed. Can’t wait to get rid of this thing. Update: took off two stars because it doesn’t record 24/7 and it feels / looks cheap. When they add 24 video recording not just clips as well as notifications if the WiFi drops I’ll consider upgrading to the paid plan. It needs battery backup also. The motion detection in incredible. Just mounted two of them. Video is really good not incredible but that’s probably my WiFi and not the camera. Definitely happy with purchase so far. Ignore other reviews probably people who work at competitors.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I lost a lot of money on this product because Amazon isn’t upfront in telling customers that 1) it works only in the U.S.; and 2) it works only with some of its own products. So now it’s basically useless, and I lost more than PhP8,500 of good money! I can’t even sell it in the Philippines because I don’t want to fool people into believing that it’ll work the way Amazon fools people.
customer_reviews.author: mda

customer_reviews.title: Probably Saved My House
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I were outside and not coming in the house anytime soon. I received an alert from the Cloud Cam app on my phone that our smoke alarm was going off. I ran inside and found one of our stove burners was turned on high and had set some paper and other thing on fire that happened to be sitting on top of it. My dog was trying to reach a loaf of bread on the counter and apparently bumped the digital stove control (I should have had it locked). I quickly extinguished the fire with very minminal damage. If not for that alert from Cloud Cam this could have been much much worse!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Price

customer_reviews.title: Horrible video Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 of these and the video quality is just ok and most of the other times horrible. Blurry pixelated and choppy. I called Amazon and was told that someone would be calling me back but they never did. I am extremely disappointed in these cameras as the video playback is nowhere as nice as what they show you on there website. I just bought a RING flood light setup and that is amazing quality. I wish I could return these. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: No downloading or sharing of clips without subscription makes this pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed I cannot share or download the clips even within 24 hours. That seems to be the entire point of a security camera, which was why I purchased this product. Will likely return the two units unless this changes. I will update the review if this changes but for now - do not buy. Otherwise - Great product setup and form factor.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Rapidly improving via software updates
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has been quickly pushing out updates to address the biggest concerns of these reviews. You can now download clips with the free plan, disable audio recording, flip the video orientation, and toggle the nightvision LEDs. So just make sure you look at the latest reviews and information when considering this camera. I’ve been very happy with mine and trust that Amazon will address any other issues that can be solved in software.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Looks and cost is deceiving.  Better buys elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking design aesthetically and works well, but with BIG negatives: 1. You can only have 3 cameras before having to buy in to Amazon 9.99 per month plan to add more cameras! That is huge cost if you have a need for for than 3 cams for home which isn't hard to exceed. The Nest cam lets you add upto 20. 2. Resolution of camera is terrible, can hardly makeout a pwrsons face from 15ft away. 3. while camera looks good, the Stupidly designed power adapter having usb cord stucked out like a sore thumb. Also, there should be a secured power option so that my baby sitter doesnt just easily unplug it to disable recording.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delayed start to recording
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t been too disappointed or overly impressed with this product. Initially it was consuming a ton of our Wifi data and we contacted amazon tech several times. They never identified an issue but it doesn’t seem to be an issue any more. The downside is if you put it in an area with a tree or sunshine it will pick up all that motion unless you adjust the sensitivity down but then it will not pick up the motion by people. Quite regularly the start of the recording will be cut off by a few seconds so that is disappointing. I do enjoy now having a camera though and it is a great price compared to some competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this but I cant. It's an OK basic camera of you dont pay the extra monthly fees. All the "features" looked to be included but you actually have to PAY for them!!! That's a bait and switch. Second, the motion senor is poor. Its hit or miss if it picks up a person 5 feet in front of it!!! I have one pointed outside and it actually works well if you have some lights on your house and dont use the IR at night. I'll probably keep these (maybe) but I would definitely recommend another camera company. I got these only because they had decent reviews and were half off on Prime day.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: 24 hour recording. You pay for longer periods. Camera does not record well at night without night LEDs. People record with this camera through windows and cant use the LEDs due to reflection. One of the BIGGEST Problems I have is it can not reconnect when it loses wifi connection due to an outage or other reason. I have to power it down to reconnect. Great when not at home. My Alexas firetv dvr and all other devices all reconnect. Its great when it happens when I am away. Person detect works only with subscription and never works in low light. Note: I dont use night LEDS. Blocks of recordings, hours sometimes, dont record to cloud.
customer_reviews.author: papa

customer_reviews.title: Too many problems right now
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these for about 9 months now, both from Best Buy. One of them, the quality got bad after a week. It looks like filming from a 20 year old flip phone, to the effect of not being able to identify a face if somone stood in front of it. It's useless other than alerting me to motion. The other one has maintained its quality, however, it seems to miss a lot of events. I will see recorded events of cars leaving my driveway but never them entering (which is impossible) Also, it would be nice to force a recording (regardless of a detected event).
customer_reviews.author: AwJeez

customer_reviews.title: Decent camera, software needs some work
customer_reviews.text: The images are fine, and the alert functions work perfectly. The "Home-Away" feature which uses your cell phone's location to know when to turn the camera on or off fails regularly, which significantly impairs this camera's capacity as a security device. I encounter other issues a few times a week in accessing the camera through the app. Otherwise, the whole setup is significantly better than the cheap cameras I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: MmmmmmK

customer_reviews.title: Constantly having issues
customer_reviews.text: I have 10 of these, I got them all on Prime Day in 2018. At first, things were great, but over time, I've had nothing but problems. Sometimes the cameras don't work at all, and other times they don't record any events or send any notifications. There is very little support for these. The only suggestion is to just return them. There are a lot of problems with these, but for 60 dollars there were initially a really good deal. Now, I'm not sure they're even worth owning at all. There are so many other cameras that have software that is actually well-written, unlike the abandonware-quality that runs these. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Microphone Echo Issues/Incompatible w/iPad4
customer_reviews.text: OK, the camera works great, setup was easy. But how do you turn off the microphone? Mom leaves the TV up loud and it reverberates (echos) into the mic and I have to disconnect and reconnect to make it stop. Surely this is not how it is supposed to work. Just found out it will not work with my Mom's iPad 4. I am often disappointed with this purchase. I am switching to airing. Can anyone help with this issue?
customer_reviews.author: J. Culver

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: When it works this camera is great. The problem is that since I had it, it has suddenly stopped working and the app asks me to manually reset the camera by pushing a paper clip into a little hole in the back. The last time this happened recently I was out of town. So just when I needed the camera the most, it stopped working. I had a competitor’s camera for years that worked consistently. I upgraded to Amazon because of the crystal clear picture. Wish I hadn’t. What good is a great picture if the camera works intermittently.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Adams

customer_reviews.title: SAVED VIDEOS ARE DELETED WITHOUT WARNING
customer_reviews.text: Bought the cam in July, it was working great for months. Until today, when I took a look only to find all recording clips gone. Nothing in Amazon Drive Trash. No warning beforehand. Contacted support chat only to confirm that a monthly subscription is required (on top of what I'm already paying for S3/Amazon Drive, I suppose) and that my deleted files cannot be recovered. Could have at least warned me so I could move a couple videos of me building stuff to a different location. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Philip Romov

customer_reviews.title: Camera is fine, cloud service is lousy.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because my Dropcam finally died. The Nest system for recording video and monitoring is vastly superior to the Amazon experience. In fact, it does not even compare. When you get an event notification, it merely streams the several seconds of the event, unlike Nest which will continuously stream from that point. Picture quality is fine, as is audio quality. But a pretty substandard cloud service.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Tobolski

customer_reviews.title: Literal Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I thought this cam would be good and boy was I wrong. I had it setup for security monitoring of my living room. Had a break in and the burglar turned the camera around then the camera filled the 3 allowed recordings that used to be many more, like 20 or so (amazon changed this with no notification whatsoever) with recordings of the wall. Thanks amazon, you suck. anyone would be much better off with any ip camera, a surveillance NAS and paying someone to set it up and that would cost less than paying for one camera and pro service for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Bought two during a summer sale.  One was a Christmas gift that does not work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Cloud Cams during a summer sale on Amazon. One I started using immediately and the other I put away for a Christmas gift. Not thrilled with the poor sound quality. My old DropCam is clear and crisp. Anyway, the second Cloud Cam I gave as a gift was a dud. My friend was able to connect for all of five minutes. We attempted several resets but it would always end up the same. Flashing yellow light. I guess that great Summer deal wasn't so great. I'm biting the bullet and buying Nest cams.
customer_reviews.author: David Perez

customer_reviews.title: Quality Video, Easy Setup, Home/Away Infuriatingly Sketchy
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent addition to my home security setup, but I have to manually shut the camera off when I get home or else I get spammed by "motion detected" alerts. There is a Home/Away setting that is supposed to automatically turn the camera off when my phone is home and on when I leave. The "Away" part seems to work well, but the "Home" part never seems to work. I can stand right next to the camera with my phone, and it will not turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Go Vegan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera to watch my dogs while I am not home. It has amazing video quality and great sound quality. I am very impressed with this camera and will purchase more. I purchased an extra one to use in the baby room for the great sound and great wide agle video. Another excellent product from Amazon. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Still a work in progress.
customer_reviews.text: The good - amazing picture and sound. Ability to set geo-fencing and schedule. Can customize sensitivity so that motion sensor isn’t triggered every few seconds. The bad - requires a plan to fully utilize every feature. Most disappointing? Tied to one account/phone only. Is Amazon only trying to sell single member households? I would pay for a plan if it would allow for a typical household where you have more than one person. Come on Amazon, I know you can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mufasa

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had found a way to integrate with Ring
customer_reviews.text: Annoyed that I bought several of these cameras with the eventual plan to have a whole house system set up (indoors and out). Amazon seems to have had already acquired Ring while pushing this product - I wish they would have made real effort to integrate the two systems. Now a bunch of us are left with cameras that will sooner rather than later be obsolete and also have to either scrap our current cameras and start over or try to juggle two separate camera systems, what a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Never able to access the cameras remotely.i have dual high speed Internet access in my home and when trying to access the cameras remotely I can never get them to load. Being that is the main reason I purchased the cameras it was definitely not worth the money spent. I would’ve returned them. However because we were in able to install them immediately due to vacations we weren’t aware they didn’t work until after the 45 day return period.
customer_reviews.author: TAguilar

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. Garbage until the location and Home/Away functions work.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage due to Home/Away feature not working. The Android feature has never worked. Absolutely awful. The iOS worked for a bit, but now never works. See many other reviews in the Cloud Cam app on iOS and the Google play store. Functionally it seems ok, but largely useless. Whenever you are home, it doesn't realize it and will constantly ping you about motion detected. Even opening the app and reediting locations didn't help. It's garbage.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Runner

customer_reviews.title: Might be the first thing I hate from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Might be the first thing I hate from Amazon. I get false motion detected alerts constantly. When I swipe to view them on my phone, the camera is unavailable, or an error occurred, or something that prevents me from seeing the actual view from the camera. Turning on/off the camera from the app is borderline useless as it mostly throws an error. For $120, Amazon needs to do better.
customer_reviews.author: BigPoppa

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! One of the best on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon makes great reliable products so I was shocked to see the low ratings. If you do your research, then you’ll see exactly what you’re getting. Picture quality is great. Field of view is wide. Motion detection is spot on and you get notifications instantly. Allows you to turn the camera off when you’re home and turns back on when you leave your home (uses the location of your phone.) There are additional features that require a subscription but for me, the free version works great for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Yonathan Ayalew

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Installation was simple. Camera did a long update after I started. I did not sign up for any plan and somehow I am able to download and share clips. I was able to send my wife a clip via text message. If I click to save the videos they download to my Google photo app. Camera could be a little more clear though but not bad. Update 12/16/2017..All was fine until a couple hours ago. The clips stopped downloading into the app. All I get is the notification that the camera picked up movement. 12/17...Amazon sending new camera. Happy customer again. Update 12/21/2017 New camera works great and so does the app.
customer_reviews.author: JTK

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS FIRST
customer_reviews.text: This product only allows you to view clips from the past that were recorded based on some sort of activity. The Nest Cam allows you to scroll through an entire period of time to see what's been going on. The fact that you can't go back and look at EVERYTHING makes this camera one of the most useless cameras out there. I wish I could return it, but my husband bought it for me and didn't give it to me right away. He thought he was buying a Nest Cam.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W Todt

customer_reviews.title: Needs serious software improvements to be practical.
customer_reviews.text: Since videos are no longer accessible from Amazon drive, it is no longer practical to find or review videos more than a few hours old even through they are stored for 7 days. You have to scroll through every video from current to past to find the ones you want. There is no way to search or filter by time or event type. If you have an active house or pets, there will be dozens of events per hour. And when you do finally find the events you are interested in, you can only down load them one at a time. The cameras are great but only useable through the Amazon cloud cam website.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Ehlke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, wish I could watch feed on PC
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - very easy setup - high quality picture quality - camera's microphone captures sound well - camera's speaker works well - the wide viewing angle helps compensate for the lack of pan/tilt Cons: - Disappointed that I can only view the camera's feed on a mobile application or Fire TV; I would really like to be view the feed on a PC (e.g. while at work); Even with a subscription, it seems you still need to use your phone to download and share clips. - no pan-tilt-zoom - cannot connect audio output to speakers / bluetooth (would be nice if we could do this, similar to echo dot functionality)
customer_reviews.author: anonymous123456789

customer_reviews.title: The daytime quality is very very good 2. The nighttime quality is good too 3
customer_reviews.text: After weeks of research I decided on the Amazon Cloud Cam. I bought this about 6 months ago but wanted to keep using it before posting a review right away. Soooo 1. The daytime quality is very very good 2. The nighttime quality is good too 3. The app is so useful, being able to see your home while you’re away is sooo helpful. The notifications are great and not too sensitive. 4. I love that you can download snippets of your home video to your phone/computer 5. Being able to talk into the video cam is helpful as well. I like that feature. Overall it is a good cam
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Desperately needs a software update
customer_reviews.text: C'mon...the most basic thing! No one wants a green light constantly on. Make it an option to turn the light off while the camera is operating.
customer_reviews.author: eee

customer_reviews.title: Tired of paying for subscriptions!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this camera provides me with a sense of security. I can monitor my office from home. However, if you do not buy a subscription to limit your monitoring to zones and live person monitoring, you’ll receive notifications every 10 seconds ALL day. The subscription isn’t much, but I’m tired of being roped into this subscription and that subscription. Why can’t the camera just work without a subscription and without blowing up my phone. Every time a light flickers outside, I get a notification. Can someone sell me a product that I don’t need a subscription for. All of these subscriptions are starting to add up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product
customer_reviews.text: No wonder it's not for sale anymore. I can't connect it to the wifi anymore after I changed my internet connection. Suddenly its not recognizing my phone's Bluetooth anymore. I've tried all the troubleshooting suggestions to no avail. Amazon wasn't much help either. It's out of warranty (just barely). Don't buy amazon products. They're garbage products and not worth the price. Hastily made and no customer service to help.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: more features will be added to the app to allow better control the camera hardware
customer_reviews.text: I believe these cameras suffer greatly from the lack of a well-developed app. The app doesn't have any features that allow controlling the brightness and contrast of the image. The camera's contrast at night is much too low, I owned less expensive cameras where the contrast and brightness could be controlled from the app. This app goes against convention by requiring you select image areas to ignore, rather than selecting areas to include in motion/person detection. The option to record a live view should be added also. I'm laboring under the assumption that as time passes, more features will be added to the app to allow better control the camera hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Tricknees

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I also have an Arlo, this one is different but great as well, there's no alarm tone you can set off to scare people but you can listen in, it's pretty quick on response to moment in the room. Does need to stay plugged into wall outlet, there's no battery -- which depending where you need to put it, can be convenient. Good night vision too, clear sound recording, clear enough picture as described. I recommend it, have to a few people looking into buying a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased my second Amazon Cloud camera. They both were very east to set up using the Alexa app. Compared to cameras that I bought a few years ago and have since thrown away because they were impossible to set up with really bad software, these cameras were a breeze. The picture they produce is wide-angle and they look like high definition color video on my I-Phone and I-Pad. There are dozens of excellent features... some require buying into the Amazon cloud subscription, however I have chosen to stick with the no-cost basics that fit my needs entirely. I do not hesitate to highly recommend these cameras... and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: The Vernier Scale

customer_reviews.title: Camera is good - software is awful
customer_reviews.text: If you need to find or pull video of something its virtually impossible. The software here is significantly worse than Nest. If you just want to keep a lose eye on things this is fine - but if you want to actually go back and check on things and see when something actually happened its not worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Borzou

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my apartment, set it up in a spot to be able to watch my front door and deck door. The motion detection is great, a little moth flew across the room one day and I got a notification for it. The person detection is awesome, when I walk in my apartment I hear my phone ding a second later telling me it detected a person. I've used this to monitor the maintenance people while I was at work when they came to fix things or do apartment inspections.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: it is good, but very often the cameras don't work
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it is good, but very often the cameras don't work. Part of the problem is the green light that is pretty bright. People coming into my house see the light, know the cameras are on and can just unplug them. There should be a way to avoid the light in the front of the camera. Also, the link to Alexa may be good from one viewpoint, but again, people coming into the house know to just tell Alexa to turn the cameras off.
customer_reviews.author: No name submitted

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: The biggest thing that makes these cameras awful is the motion sensing. Most times it did not sense people walking up my driveway, ringing the bell, standing there, and then entering. What's the point of a security camera? The few times it did sense motion the alerts I received were late. Too late (1-2min) to do anything about it. Again pointless. The sound is below average. Any pro's? The wires are long. The connection is easy. The camera are compact. I can't return them as I traveled immediately after, my fault for trusting Amazon camera's to be worry free.
customer_reviews.author: EBE

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it could not get it to connect to my wifi despite repeated attempts and resets, support could not help me, turned off my 5.0 broadcast system and still could not connect to the 2.4 wifi broadcast. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: scrubs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: Incredible camera. Amazon got it right on the first try. I have several other cameras, wired and wi-fi. This is the best picture of any of them, by far. The picture is excellent day and night. Most impressive, however, was set-up and the app. The camera set up in minutes, with no issue at all - a far different story from all of the wi-fi cameras that I have dealt with. And the app is simply wonderful. I would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, frustrating to use!
customer_reviews.text: Paired on first attempt which made it easy to use. NIght vision is pretty limited, and it's not weather proof so I bought the outdoor cover for it. Significantly more expensive than most, but easier to setup and pair to wifi. But....update: this has been the most frustrating thing I've bought from Amazon. I turn off the notifications in the Alexa app and they keep coming from the camera. To reboot the camera you have to take it out of it's outdoor cover, press a button with a paper clip, and after rebooting and pairing it does the same thing - notifications endlessly even though I have them turned off. And now I'm beyond the 30 day return window...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It almost does what I want
customer_reviews.text: The camera has decent motion detection and the ability to tune in the sensitivity and I like that. Picture quality during daytime is decent, at night it depends on your particular use case and mounting scenario. My two big gripes with this product are that it goes down some times requiring a hard reset that requires you to be physically with the camera. It went down on the first day of my vacation and so I could not view the front door. The second problem is you can't leave a continuous view of the front door on a tablet. The live view inevitably crashes and you have to access the camera again which takes longer then it should.
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Smelled really foul when unboxing, difficult setup, and lots of unsolicited follow up emails. The app is poorly rated, and I know why, it's really difficult to navigate. Setup failed, and the help section is a joke. Beyond that, this is a cheap knock off of the real brand product. save your time and money, and skip this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Streaming and App are poorly developed buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointed with this device. I installed it and followed all of the directions to the letter. The app itself is garbage. My camera will not load on my phone while on cellular data. Connection speed ruled out on my phone 100 mbps download ans 10 mbps upload. Home wifi much faster than that. I got this camera for the streaming feature and it only works on wifi. No help from amazon on this. I will not buy or recommend this prosuct
customer_reviews.author: Vladislav Kostin

customer_reviews.title: It forgets how to access my network
customer_reviews.text: I have a hidden network, if this camera loses power (even for a short period of time) then I have to press a button on the back of the Cloud Cam and retrain it to work with my network. This has never been an issue with other products. This camera would get five stars if it remembered its connection but once it drops the video feed ends and so much for home security
customer_reviews.author: R. Powers

customer_reviews.title: cloudcam.amazon.com does not work anymore  ( Here is a fix )
customer_reviews.text: Device is great, video quality is acceptable, Night vision is good as well. CloudCam app works, but "cloudcam.amazon.com" does not work any more All I get is "An unexpected error has occurred." So, its not an issue with the camera, but with your browser settings. You need to configure the browser to allow "Camera" in browser "Site Settings" ( click on the lock icon in the browser address bar)
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh Manni

customer_reviews.title: as there are better and less costly ones on the market
customer_reviews.text: Okay camera, as there are better and less costly ones on the market. However, integrates into your Prime account well and with Echo Show (another over-priced Amazon echo device). The app on phone works okay. No way to turn off annoying green or blue light on front of camera. No turning off microphone or infrared either. But the most annoying thing is the “wall wart” to plug into wall. Not easy to have behind furniture and sticks out into room. Should also be available in Black. Overall okay, but expect better from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous software update
customer_reviews.text: For the past 30 days we’ve used this as a baby monitor and loved it. After the last update, the zoom and mic buttons stay on the screen of devices like the Show and Spot. Here’s the problem with that...I can’t see my baby or much of anything! Before the update, you could tap the screen to bring up the icons and that made sense. Having them as permanent fixtures ruins the useability of devices like the Spot. I wanted to buy another camera but will not until this issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to plug in and connect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to plug and play. Great picture accurate adjustable motion control sensor and the integration with Alexa is fun. I got one to try out and it covers the entire living room and the Alexa dot I have at work chimes and I can check on the pets. The two-way communicator works well. Highly recomend. I'll look into the ser​vice later but for now, 24 hours of recordings meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Stanco

customer_reviews.title: Uses too much bandwidth
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with my Cloud Cam. First of all, your video want be stored in a cloud without signing up for a plan. I'm a Prime member and own almost every Amazon device yet I have to pay even more for cloud storage. Another problem is that the cam used 12 to 14 GB of bandwidth daily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Scheduler function doesn't work. Needs better customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The scheduler function doesn't work at all for me. I'm on an android. I set two schedules up for the weekdays and the weekends while I'm scheduled to be at home. The camera stays all on the time and alerts motion all the time. I had to turn the motion notification off because of this. When I set up a schedule for the camera to be off...it should turn off at the time. Also, I called Amazon customer service about this and he knew nothing about the schedule function. He said that "he has an Iphone"...and basically told me that the Amazon "engineers" would look into my claim and get back with me. It's been a few days now.
customer_reviews.author: D. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Extremely clear picture and sound. I keep Indoors and stream through window and still have great picture. Would recommend to turn off lights when streaming through windows- works great. Super easy set up - considering getting a second. Motion detection is excellent - almost too good- had to adjust to low sense and it still picks up cars passing by at 20 ft away. Free cloud included, which most don’t have. Only issue is that you can’t access purchasing cloud plans from any app... still working on figuring that out but overall amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting from Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: I have several Amazon devices that are connected to my Wi-Fi, and I love them all. Unfortunately this camera is not lovable. When it works it looks good but every day it disconnects from the Wi-Fi for no apparent reason. Everything that I can troubleshoot has been analyzed...still no resolution. I purchased the camera for security reasons so it’s important to have a reliable connection to my Wi-Fi. Sadly, the return period is over and I’m stuck with it. My advice is, if you purchase one make sure you hook it up quickly so you can return it within the allotted return period.
customer_reviews.author: DianaDesigns2

customer_reviews.title: 25% fail
customer_reviews.text: The most negative thing is that if you have more than three you must upgrade to a plan! This was not clear in the description. Of the four that I purchased one does not work at all. The other negative is that unless you buy a plan you cannot distinguish between motion detection and human movement detection. Lastly there are times I’m notified of movement and watching the recording there is absolutely not even a cloud passing overhead to account for the movement.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D Mack

customer_reviews.title: My Ring doorbell worked fantastic but these Cloud Cameras were just impossible to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was never able to get the camera phone app to really control the cameras. I would turn them off if we were in the house to prevent false alarms. They would turn themselves back on again. I was never able to get the ability to control them well. My ring doorbell worked fantastic but these were just impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Limited to viewing clips as determined by the camera...I miss full 24/7 coverage.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the quality of the video, I’m regretting this purchase and plan to go back to my Nest Cams. I liked the integration with Alexa, but I miss the ability to review the full 24 hours. The motion detection seems to miss activity from my pets and cuts tha activity it does capture into tiny clips, so if I want a full video of an event, I’m out of luck. I also miss the ability to watch both cameras at the same time on the apps. It is too late to return them, so I guess I will hang onto them and wait to see if improvements are made. I’m just so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Strebe

customer_reviews.title: you won't get a good pic of your burglar
customer_reviews.text: The camera works well with motion detection but the video is Not triggered by sound alone, i.e., No sound detection (major drawback). There are no settings for audio detection in the app. It does not have the capability of recording always On or just on motion detection. Picture wise, it says 1080p but when you zoom in picture quality goes down fast, so if you wanted to zoom in to recognize facial features, you won't get a good pic of your burglar.
customer_reviews.author: Juels

customer_reviews.title: additional 20 dollar power adapter required. Boo
customer_reviews.text: Super lame, registered for garage key delivery and the app automatically asked if I wished to add an Amazon Cloud cam for added security. Cool! I thought, bam. Purchased. Just tried to set it up and it requires an additional power adapter to work with key garage app. Why not point me in the right direction in the first place or hell, add it to a "key garage delivery package" for the additional mark up. Better yet put a big loud yellow sticker on box stating that it's worthless for Key delivery without shelling out another Jackson. WASTE of life, Bezos is too busy with his tabloid harem to pay attention to details. Super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Missing features.
customer_reviews.text: Missing important feature. Length of recording to short with no settings to extend the time. And no force recording when viewing live.
customer_reviews.author: mrbasicshark

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So install took a minute because of updates but once up and running it was really simple we installed on on our carport Wich is roughly 80 feet from the house and it picked up our wifi sound works best outside if it’s got a three wall room to bounce off of we moved it outside the carport and lost audio quality . However messing with our chickens vi the speaker is the most fun I’ve had in a while 😂so we shall see how it works while we are on vacation . Bought it to watch pets and property while not at home. I don’t have anything to compare it to but it did great
customer_reviews.author: Jsattler98

customer_reviews.title: REALLY STUPID APP FLAW!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY EXPENSIVE TO USE. Even when connected to WiFi, the app uses mobile data, first! Not WiFi. Customer service says only work around is to disable mobile data when connected to WiFi. Nope. Not a good solution.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Ugh! My son hit his head last night and got a bloody nose. I went to look at the footage and it won’t show me! It was less than 12hrs ago. These cameras are hit and miss. Definitely not consistent. Super annoyed. I had a family member come in my house and I was watching it and then randomly it just stopped recording for about 5 hours (different camera). We have a bunch in our house and they are pretty useless unless you want to see real time. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cloudcam gives the same alert dozen of times, Home/Away works then doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I get dozen of notice of the same clip on my smartphone and fire hd table. One camera event is repeated over and over again. Same exact time of event and length are notified to me. The Home/Away feature is unreliable. i have a internal to home came to stop alert when my smartphone is in the house. It worked and now it doesn't then it works again. Also get the same problem with repeated alerts about the same thing. Cloudcam software unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: BSherwood

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for $119. It mounted to my wall, overlooking my front And back door. The field of view is really awesome. Install took about 5 minutes. Download the app, pair with your phone. BOOM. It can be set so that when your phone leaves the house, the camera automatically starts recording movement. Easy. It also can record voice and also has a speaker so you can speak to whoever shows up on your phones "Live View". I love messing with my family when I'm not there. Some random voice from some random god speaking through the camera. Fun!. Also, the infrared night camera setting is very good. Overall it's exactly what I wanted and it's works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: We needed camera for our new nanny starting. We could not decide between the cloud cam or the NEST. We decided to do the cloud cam as it does not require a monthly fee to get VIDEO of detected motion. It is works great picture is clear. Set up took 10 minutes. We were concerned that out internet would crash since we have a low broadband but it is working fine. The one thing I thought it did was the ability to move the camera on your device. You can not do that but I realized the picture is wide so didnt need that anyways. You can zoom in. We are very happy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, works great! -- except for browsing the captured videos
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3. Setup was easy, assuming you have a power outlet not too far away. Overall it works great, just as advertised. Live camera is fine. Motion detect works well but the biggest downside to me is the inability to easily browse videos across a timeline - you can only access individual files one at a time, and there can be many, many, many individual files. That is a huge negative which I hope will be resolved via software changes in the viewing tools. Still giving it 4 stars because everything else seems to work great, no headaches, and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nest a better cam, but Amazon Cam Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I needed 3 cams , so this was my best option. I bought 3 nest cams, but returned them because the nest aware charged per Cam. With amazon ii only need to buy one supsvription to save clips. I will say the nest camera is a better Cam, and the storage is for the Cam iallows rewind for 20 days non stop, , but I couldn’t justify spending $40 a month for that capibility. Amazon should be able to roll out these capabilities soon, They do have AWS and probably wouldn't hurt the bottom line much.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I am having a very difficult time understanding all the poor reviews for this camera because for me it is and does everything I expected. I know that as of January 2018 some of the smaller issues (like manual control of microphone/IR lights) have been addressed and that's great. Otherwise it's a fine product: the picture is good, the notifications are exactly what you would like, the clips always start at the beginning of activity without a terrible delay, and I've had no problem downloading and reviewing clips, even without the subscription service. None of these cloud cameras is perfect, but this one has been a very good choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: WiscoDad

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price. No 24/7 recording option
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a decent camera set for indoor monitoring and, with the exception of a couple annoyances (mentioned below), I would recommend it. The subscription service is very affordable. It is very convenient to have 2-way voice through the app, and I can bring up the video feeds hands-free on my tablet with Alexa. Pros: + Cost is affordable + Works seamlessly with Alexa + Very easy to set up + Video quality is great, including night vision Cons: - No option for 24/7 recording (only records "triggered events"). This has occasionally resulted in missed events, which has been frustrating. - these are indoor only. It would be nice to have an outdoor model.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Update killed the cam.....
customer_reviews.text: **** updated review: I gave it a 5 start rating at first but now and after the new app update u have to reboot your phone every time you change wifi !!!! Plus now u can only stream it on one device at a time..... so basically useless as a security camera...... ZERO STARS!!!! A really good camera with very good night vision.... was super smooth and easy to pair and setup the camera compared to the other cheap brands.... and the most important thing it actually works with alexa....i mean really works with a very minimum wait which was a problem for me with all other cameras. Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Cant view live on my phone
customer_reviews.text: Cameras work fine and the home/away feature works better than the nest cam I had. Only issue is that I cant view live from my phone and you have to have the most up to date browser on a computer to view live, which my work doesn't have. I can still view recorded clips, just not live view. Called and started a work ticket on the issue 2 weeks ago and was told they should work with any phone service and any browser. Havent heard anything since.
customer_reviews.author: jandy71

customer_reviews.title: After returning 4 cameras
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT A CAMERA IN JUNE THIS YEAR AND IT WORKS PERFECT. I BOUGHT 2 MORE LAST MONTH AND NEITHER WORKED, AMAZON SENT ME 2 NEW CAMERAS. 1 CAMERA WORKED AND THE OTHER WOULD GO OFF ON ITS OWN. AMAZON SENT 2 MORE CAMERAS AND I SENT BACK THE 2 THAT DID NOT WORK. THE 2 I GOT, ONE WORKS AND THE OTHER GOES OFF ALL THE TIME. I HAVE NOT BOTHERED TO ASK FOR A REFUND. I AM TIRD OF GOING TO UPS. NO MORE CLOUD CAMS. I WILL JUST EAT THE ONE THAT DOES NOT WORK. NO MORE AMAZON ELECTRONICS FOR ME.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mott

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for exactly 1 year now and about 2 months ago the video was starting to show lines through the images. Then recently it just stopped working all together. I have tried unpairing, factory resetting, uninstalling and reinstalling the app, all to no avail. I have 3 other brands of cameras in the house all of which have worked longer than this. Normally I'm a fan of Amazon products, but this one has failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Kitson

customer_reviews.title: Nice beta version
customer_reviews.text: Compared to Nest Cams, this camera needs to make a lot of improvements to just catch up: 1. Cannot adjust the angles of camera. If your camera is upside down then all your videos are upside down. 2. I cannot seem to figure out how multiple people's phones can have Home/Away features. Right now, only one phone is enabled for this feature. 3. The mic to talk to person on video does not seem to work. Just get Nest Cams when they go on sale on holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Kim

product_meta.title: Amazon Cloud Cam Security Camera, Works with Alexa
feature_bullets: Stay connected 24/7 - Catch activities as they happen in 1080p Full HD. Watch, download, and share the last 24 hours of motion alert video clips for free.
Notifications – Get notified when Cloud Cam sees activity. Check in anytime or watch motion clips on the Cloud Cam mobile app.
See clearly in the dark - Night vision lets you detect what’s happening around the clock. Turn on/off night vision LEDs in the Cloud Cam App.
Two-way audio - Check in with the family or tell your dog to stop barking.
30-day free trial of Cloud Cam Plans – Get Smart Alerts and advanced features like person and audio detection, Zones, and see up to 30 days of video history.
Works with Alexa - Just ask Alexa to show your live feed on your Amazon Fire TV, Fire Tablet, Echo Show, or Echo Spot.

Cloud Cam is always getting smarter with more advanced notifications, detection, and features. Just announced: get notified when Cloud Cam detects specific sounds: glass breaking, a baby crying, a dog barking, or a smoke/carbon monoxide alarm.
For Amazon Key, purchase the Amazon Key Home Kit, which includes Cloud Cam (Key Edition). You need Cloud Cam (Key Edition) that features a Key Edition power cable to enable Amazon Key.
